echo-category-title-requestssl-request-c: Comment added to an request ssl request
echo-category-title-requestssl-request-s: Status updated for an request ssl request
echo-pref-tooltip-requestssl-new-request: Notify me when there are any new request ssl requests.
echo-pref-tooltip-requestssl-request-com: Notify me when there is a comment on an request ssl request that I have participated on.
echo-pref-tooltip-requestssl-request-sta: Notify me when the status is updated for an request ssl request that I have participated on.
requestssl-comment-success: Comment successfully added to this request.
requestssl-desc: An extension designed to automate user import requests.
requestssl-duplicate-request: Unable to submit this request. It is too similar to an already open request.
requestssl-help-reason: Please describe in detail the reason you are making this request ssl request.
requestssl-help-customdomain: Enter the full URL of the source wiki (where you are importing from).
requestssl-help-target: This must be a valid database name.
requestssl-info-request-private: This request is marked as private. It is not publicly viewable.
requestssl-info-requester-globally-block: The requester ($1) has been globally blocked. This request should be declined.
requestssl-info-requester-locally-blocke: The requester ($1) has been locally blocked on this wiki ($2).
requestssl-info-requester-locked: The requester ($1) has been locked. This request should be declined.
requestssl-invalid-target: The provided target is not a valid database name.
requestssl-label-interwiki-prefix: Enter the prefix to add to the wiki's local interwiki table:
requestssl-label-interwiki-url: Enter the URL to add to the wiki's local interwiki table (e.g. $1):
requestssl-label-lock: Lock this request from being edited or from comments being added to it?
requestssl-label-status-updated-comment: Optional additional comment to add to this request:
requestssl-label-update-status: Set the status of this request to:
requestssl-log-header: This is a log of all request ssl requests and status updates.
requestssl-notcentral-text: request ssl requests are disabled on this wiki. Please request an request ssl from the central wiki.
requestssl-notification-body-new-request:
A new request ssl request was received.
Reason given: $1
Requester: $2
Target Database Name: $3
requestssl-notification-header-comment: request ssl request #$1 received a comment.
requestssl-notification-header-status-up: Status updated for request ssl request #$1
requestssl-notloggedin: Sorry, you need to [$1 log in] before you can request an request ssl.
requestssl-private: You do not have permission to view this request as it is marked as private.
requestssl-request-locked: This request has been locked. It can not be edited, and no comments can be added to it.
requestssl-status-updated-success: Status successfully updated for this request.
requestssl-success: Your request ssl request ($1) was successfully submitted. Your request will be reviewed as soon as possible.
requestssl-success-locked: This request has been successfully locked. It can no longer be edited and comments cannot be added to it.
requestssl-success-private: This request has been successfully marked as private. It is no longer publicly viewable.
requestssl-success-public: This request has been successfully marked as public. It is now publicly viewable.
requestssl-success-unlocked: This request has been successfully unlocked.
requestsslprivate-log-header: This is a log of all request ssl requests and status updates for requests with targets that are private wikis.
logentry-requestssl-request: $1 requested an request ssl for $4 in $5.
logentry-requestssl-statusupdate: $1 updated status of request ssl request $4 to '$5'.
logentry-requestsslprivate-request: $1 requested an request ssl for private wiki $4 in $5.
logentry-requestsslprivate-statusupdate: $1 updated status of private request ssl request $4 to '$5'.
